p.s: In the scene at hand from the teen coming of age film The Hate U Give, short THUGThe Hate You Give, released in 2018, directed by George Tillmann Jr., you see how Starr and Chris, her boyfriend, make up after the condomegate incident.
The scene starts ofoff with Chris walking through the hallway of Williamson High greeting his friends and Starr being at her locker.
When Chris sees her he walks up to her and put his headphones on her.
After Starr taking the headphones ofoff and turning to Chris she confronts him about what happened with the condom.
Chris starts to explain to her why he did that.
He wants to get closer to Starr but didn't know how.
Turns out the beat that Starr listened to over Chris's headphones is an apology for the condom incedintincident.
As a result to Starr not clearly accepting his apology he disconnects his headphones from his phone so everyone can hear it and starts dancing.
Starr is amused by this but pulls him away laughing.
